name: i, Knight
description:
i, Knight is born from the idea to make a different style of fight: innovative fights just pressing the indicated key in the exact place and in the precise moment on screen.

As a result of the work of three people, i, Knight maximizes high-quality digital 2D graphics and brings easy to learn but difficult to master fighting gameplay.

High-quality 2D Graphics
Using the power of the Unity engine and the talent of our team, i, Knight has a very good visual styling.

Warriors
Fight against 4 warriors and 3 special training stages.

Do a chain attack
From a small 2-size to a big 4-size chain attack, do a chain attack by pressing the indicated key on the screen.

Don't fail or your will lose
Pressing the wrong key makes you lose the chain attack. If you don't complete the chain attacks goal indicated in each fight on time, you will lose the complete fight.

Big trophies at the end
After winning all fights you'll get a champion belt. Three belts are available: bronze, silver, and gold. Will you be capable of success in the majority of chain attacks in order to get the gold champion belt?
